channel.title: Runescape skin?
channel.description: Okay,I've been going to some sites, etc. Such as tr3vors world switcher..They have the runescape back rounds..main menu clickables etc. Any possible way to get these runescape "skins" into some sort of forums,etc.

its all good, you can modify it abit so its not almost all copied from runescape, and almost all links don’t works… wtf?

rofl =] (lets not be enemies, u noob [me noob too, happy?] =p)

item.title: Runescape skin?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Reaper Owner Reaper
item.description:
@Owner_Reaper wrote:

ok… so the background u have… now comes the scroll bars…

get runescape source, then go to the css, and get the scrolls and crap… ok?

then put the link to those in the url box, then click the pick and drag it to ur desktop, modify if u want, then upload it into imageshack or photobucket, or w/e and last go to…

to…

brb let me go to a smf and check, brb and I’ll finish this…

EDIT: ok, go to admin, then configuration, then Manage styles, then modify style, then once there, u modify everything, make sure u uploaded the images, and put the link. You might want to modify most images, change the size, change it up a bit, so then u can use it in the forum, unless u want it to come out a bit gay… rofl.

I should create a template, called runescape, rofl =P

Read full topic
